overview: The film deals with the term of disabling. Two bodies during the pandemic, try to get to know each other-fall in love and you create a game of mirroring, they show each other their own needs & weaknesses, wanting the next time to come without a mask. The film was made in the context of the 5th Panorama Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki with the theme DEACTIVATION.
title: Like Birds
